original_text: In accordance with your great love, forgive the sin of these people, just as you have pardoned them from the time they left Egypt until now.”
korean_text: 구하옵나니 주의 인자의 광대하심을 따라 이 백성의 죄악을 사하시되 애굽에서부터 지금까지 이 백성을 사하신 것 같이 사하시옵소서

sentences.original_text: In accordance with your great love
forgive the sin of these people
just as you have pardoned them
from the time they left Egypt
